com.pushwoosh.notification

Class PushwooshNotificationSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pushwoosh.notification.PushwooshNotificationSettings

  • public class PushwooshNotificationSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    PushwooshNotificationSettings class is used to customise push notification appearance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PushwooshNotificationSettings()

    • Constructor Detail

      • PushwooshNotificationSettings

        public PushwooshNotificationSettings()

    • Method Detail

      • setMultiNotificationMode

        public static void setMultiNotificationMode(boolean on)
        Allows multiple notifications to be displayed in notification center. By default SDK uses single notification mode where each notification overrides previously displayed notification.
        Parameters:
        on - enable multi/single notification mode

      • setSoundNotificationType

        public static void setSoundNotificationType(SoundType soundNotificationType)
        Set whether sound should be played when notification is received.
        Parameters:
        soundNotificationType - sound setting

      • setVibrateNotificationType

        public static void setVibrateNotificationType(VibrateType vibrateNotificationType)
        Set whether device should vibrate when notification is received. If "Force Vibration" is set in Pushwoosh control panel for remote notification it will cause vibration regardless of this setting.
        Parameters:
        vibrateNotificationType - vibration setting

      • setLightScreenOnNotification

        public static void setLightScreenOnNotification(boolean on)
        Set whether notification should unlock screen.
        Parameters:
        on - enable screen unlock

      • setEnableLED

        public static void setEnableLED(boolean on)
        Set whether notification should cause LED blinking.
        Parameters:
        on - enable LED blinking

      • setColorLED

        public static void setColorLED(int color)
        Set LED color. setEnableLED(boolean) must be set to adjust LED color.
        Parameters:
        color - LED color

      • setNotificationIconBackgroundColor

        public static void setNotificationIconBackgroundColor(int color)
        Set notification icon background color
        Parameters:
        color - background color
        See Also:
        Notification.Builder.setSmallIcon

      • areNotificationsEnabled

        public static boolean areNotificationsEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if notifications are enabled and will appear in notification center.

      • enableNotifications

        public static void enableNotifications(boolean on)
        Set whether notifications should be enabled
        Parameters:
        on - enable notifications

      • setNotificationChannelName

        public static void setNotificationChannelName(java.lang.String name)
        Set notification channel name for API 26
        Parameters:
        name - name of notification channel
